actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963, as amended, and for other purposes.
short_title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments

summary.text: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments - Amends the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to exclude specified categories of employers and employees from the farm labor contractor registration requirements. Limits the meaning of "fee" to any consideration in excess of the actual cost of providing farm labor contractor services. Deems such a contractor an employer of the migrant workers he or she has recruited or transported if he or she is responsible for the payment of their wages, any required deductions from wages, and their supervision, and has sole authority to hire and discharge such workers.

titles.title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963, as amended, and for other purposes.
